sqlMap.insert: insert into carts (cart_no, game_no, user_no, cart_amount) values (cart_no_seq.nextval, #game.no#, #user.no#, 1)
sqlMap.update: update carts set cart_amount = #amount# where cart_no = #no#
sqlMap.select: select cart_no as no, game_no as "game.no", user_no as "user.no", cart_amount as amount from carts where game_no = #game.no# and user_no = #user.no#
sqlMap.delete: delete from carts where cart_no = #no# and user_no = #user.no#
sqlMap.select: select A.cart_no as no, A.game_no as "game.no", A.user_no as "user.no", A.cart_amount as amount, B.game_title as "game.title", B.game_price as "game.price", B.game_discount_price as "game.discountPrice", B.game_create_date as "game.createDate", B.game_image as "game.imageFileName" from carts A, games B where A.game_no = B.game_no and A.user_no = #value#

select A.cart_no as no, A.game_no as "game.no", A.user_no as "user.no", A.cart_amount as amount, B.game_title as "game.title", B.game_price as "game.price", B.game_discount_price as "game.discountPrice", B.game_create_date as "game.createDate" from carts A, games B where A.game_no = B.game_no and A.cart_no = #value#
